com.android.slackandhay.sound
Class SoundEngine

java.lang.Object
  com.android.slackandhay.sound.SoundEngine

public class SoundEngine
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the sound engine which is responsible for playing all the sounds that the sound components of the game objects may trigger. This class is a singleton.

Author:
Tilman BÃ¶rner, Jan Rabe & Tom Wallroth
